shortDescription: An arbitrary file upload vulnerability /images/background/1.php in of SolarView Compact 6.0 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted php file.
vulnerabilityName: contec sv-cpt-mc310_firmware Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
